roleset.name: baffled, garbled, mistaken for another

roles.note: With adjectival 'confused', use arg2 for the non-agentive 'confused about'.

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: People are confused about what they should eat to stay healthy.
example.arg: about what they should eat to stay healthy

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, confuse-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls amalgamate-22.2-2, amuse-31.1.
